attributes.title: Developed in China
attributes.review: I got this app to support my president, but after 8 months of waiting for it to download, I was upset to find out this was fully developed in China! This app shared my private information and I began being stalked by a local predator. Do not recommend!!! This app ruined my life, now I have to move cities, dye my hair, change my name, and tint my skin orange in an attempt to save myself from the predator who used this app to track me.
